text: hood ne javaab diya (ki bas samajh lo) ki tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se tum par azaab aur gazab naazil ho chuka kya tum mujhase chand (buto ke pharzee) naamon ke baare mein jhagadate ho jinako tumane aur tumhaare baap daadaon ne (khvaahamakhvaah) gadh lie hain haalaaki khuda ne unake lie koee sanad nahin naazil kee pas tum ( azaabe khuda ka) intazaar karo main bhee tumhaare saath muntizar hoon
